content:
# Factorio Agent Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5) connected to pipe at (-8.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at (-7.0, 3.5) with fuel inventory (35 coal)
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 3.5) producing 13500.0 kW
- Connected pipe network from (-8.5, -0.5) to (-5.5, 3.5)
- Power network with poles including at (0.5, 6.5) and (-2.5, 5.5)
- Coal buffer system:
  - Wooden chest at (-7.5, 7.5) containing 200 coal
  - Burner inserter at (-6.5, 7.5) (needs fuel)

### Oil Extraction and Storage System at position (17.5, 40.5)
Consists of:
- Pumpjack at (17.5, 40.5) working at 100% efficiency
- Storage tanks at:
  - (22.5, 40.5) containing 25.96 crude oil
  - (27.5, 40.5) containing 3.11 crude oil 
  - (32.5, 40.5) containing 0.32 crude oil
  - (37.5, 40.5)
  - (42.5, 40.5)
- Connected pipe network spanning from (18.5, 38.5) to (30.5, 41.5)
- Power network with poles including at (15.5, 39.5) and (32.5, 45.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Fuel management errors
- Monitor boiler fuel levels proactively (caused power outage when fuel depleted)
- Ensure burner inserters have fuel to operate (current inserter at (-6.5,7.5) is out of fuel)
- Establish automated fuel delivery before critical levels are reached

### Entity placement errors
- Verify clear space before placing entities (occurred when placing chest near boiler)
- Check for existing entities before placement (wooden chest placement collision)
- Consider alternative placement locations when initial attempt fails

### Power system monitoring
- Implement fuel level alerts before critical levels
- Establish redundant power sources to prevent complete shutdowns
- Monitor power consumption vs production capacity

### Production optimization
- Expand storage capacity or connect to processing facilities
- Consider adding more pumpjacks at identified locations (20.5,40.5) and (23.5,40.5)
- Implement proper fluid measurement methods (storage tanks don't have 'contents' attribute)

### API usage
- The nearest() function doesn't accept 'position' keyword argument
- Storage tanks require proper fluid measurement methods
- Import required modules before use (datetime not defined error)
